players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Bob, the mafioso, remains silent. I'm keeping my cards close to my chest for now."
Charlie: "Charlie remains silent. I'm still gathering information and haven't figured out who the mafioso is yet."
Diana: "I will continue to investigate and gather more information. I'm still the detective, so I'll try to figure out who the remaining villager is."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
